name: Accursed (Ayyad)
description:
Everything in this project is built using C++ inside Unreal Engine 4

A wave-based action game where the player is granted the choice between three boosts that provide active and / or passive buffs. The game contains 5 different enemy types including a boss.

  • High-pace action
    • Fight waves and waves of enemies in high pace action with increasing difficulty.
    • Use a 3-combo attack, a special attack, a projectile attack, a dash, and a revenge attack to win battles.
  • Specialized AI
    • Every non-boss enemy does one specific attack in a specific pattern.
    • Each enemy provides a different challenge forcing the player to think on their toes.
  • Smart interactions
    • Every now and then, The Overseer will chime in with some commentary on the player actions.

+++ Controls:
- Movement: arrow keys

- Attack: Z

- Special: X

- Cast: C

Dash: Spacebar
